The pastries are typically prepared by rolling out a sheet of pastry dough, cutting it into triangles, rolling them up into cone shapes, and baking them until golden brown. They can be filled with sweet or savory fillings such as cream cheese, jam, or sausage.

The pastries are typically made with puff pastry dough, which is rolled out and cut into cone shapes. They are then filled with a variety of sweet fillings, such as jam, custard, cream, or fruits. The pastries are then baked until golden brown.
